name: DreamScape: Daze's Adventure
description:
DreamScape: Daze's Adventure is a very short RPG experience. There is not that much to do at this moment as I wanted to produce a version 0.01 of this. There is lots of changes to come once I have time to add on to it. So if you want support the future development of this game and others please let me know by commenting, sharing with others or any donation would be greatly appreciated. 

Controls:
Movement: WASD
Inventory/Inventory navigation: X and Z
Interact with objects: E
Advance Dialog: Space

Storyline (Not implemented yet): Daze and his little brother lived together so Daze could properly take care of his brother. One day Daze's brother was kidnapped but a mysterious villain who would harness the dream from kids causing real life nightmares to roam the world. It is up to Daze to stop the nightmares and save his brother.

Features:
Explore the area around your home and find the Lab.
6 Fightable enemies.
Full equip menu and inventory system.
Original art and assets.

Credits:
Art by Kyle Winn and Me
Music by Patrick De Arteaga. Find them at https://patrickdearteaga.com
Programming by Me
Other support such as supplying a place for me to stay and funding so I can focus on this project by Knox College

Dev comments: This is my first project ever in unity and I used this project to start learning Unity and familiarize myself with the engine so if there is any bugs please let me know at dazesgame@gmail.com. I am a college student in my junior year majoring in computer science, I tried my best to put in as much time into working on this project before school starts and do intend to continue working on this game at least to fix potential bugs. I hope that you all can find some fun in this small project. With that, I would like to thank you all by stopping by!
